text: Kia Michelle Stevens (born September 4, 1977 in Carson, California) is an American female actress and former professional wrestler. She is best known for her time with Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). She was known for wrestling under the ring name Awesome Kong. She also wrestled for Ring of Honor (ROH), Shimmer Women Athletes, All Elite Wrestling (AEW), and WWE. During her time in WWE, sh wrestled under the ring name Kharma. While in TNA, she was a two-time TNA Women's Knockout Champion and one-time TNA Knockout Tag Team Champion with Hamada. On August 28, 2021, Kong announced that she was retiring from in-ring competition. At Bound for Glory on October 23, 2021, she was inducted in the Impact Hall of Fame by Gail Kim. ==References== == Other websites == * Awesome Kong's Official website * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:African-American wrestlers Category:All Elite Wrestling alumni Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Female professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling executives Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling alumni
title: Awesome Kong
